about_the_game:
🚀 Join the Fight in Rise of the Vanguard! 🚀
Hey there, future Guardian! Are you ready to gear up and dive into an action-packed universe where chaos reigns and your squad is the last line of defense? Welcome to Rise of the Vanguard—your ultimate PvE squad shooter experience!

Join forces with up to 7 friends (or brave strangers) and tackle missions that will have you battling against the Xenocratic Order, ruthless Pirate Syndicates, and the savage Ra'tic! Whether you prefer the thrill of first-person firefights or the tactical advantage of a third-person view, the choice is yours. Choose your playstyle and unleash your inner warrior!

What’s in store for you?

  • Epic Co-op Gameplay: Team up with friends or find new allies in a universe filled with danger and excitement. You’ll need every bit of teamwork you can muster to take on the Xenocratic Order, the Pirate Syndicates, and the terrifying Ra'tic!

  • Dynamic Missions: No two missions are the same! Our DMG (Dynamic Mission Generation) system creates unique challenges each time you jump into the action, keeping you on your toes and craving more! Whether you're battling in a bustling city or a hostile alien jungle, expect the unexpected.

  • Switch It Up: Prefer to take aim in first-person mode or want to see the action from a third-person perspective? You can easily switch between the two and find your sweet spot for unleashing chaos!

  • Squad Goals: Work together, communicate, and develop strategies to tackle all kinds of missions.

  • Scheduled Playtests: Join in on the action! We’re running random and scheduled playtests where you can dive into the fray, share your feedback, and help shape the game. Your voice matters!

Get ready to rise through the ranks of The Vanguard and unleash your inner hero! Whether you're a lone wolf or a team player, there's a spot for you in this intergalactic adventure.

Grab your gear, gather your squad, and let’s show the galaxy what you’re made of! The fight for the universe starts now. Join us and become a guardian of the stars!
